summary: TRANSMISSION SHIFTS ERRATICALLY. FROM A STOP THE TRUCK WILL SOMETIMES SHIFT FROM 1ST TO 5TH AND THEN BACK TO 1ST AND GET STUCK IN 1ST. SOMETIMES WHILE IN 5TH OR 6TH GEAR THE TRUCK WILL JUST SHIFT INTO 1ST, CAUSING THE RPM'S TO SPIKE AND I HAVE TO PULL OVER AND TURN OFF AND RESTART THE TRUCK. THIS MORNING IT DID THE SHIFT FROM 1ST TO 5TH AND THEN BACK TO 1ST.
